helpSupport.faq1Question: How do I reset my password?
helpSupport.faq1Answer: Go to Settings > Profile > Account Security and click 'Change Password'. You'll receive a verification code via email to complete the process.
helpSupport.faq2Question: How do I upgrade my membership?
helpSupport.faq2Answer: Navigate to Settings > Membership and select your desired plan. You can upgrade anytime, and changes take effect on your next billing cycle.
helpSupport.faq3Question: Can I save articles for offline reading?
helpSupport.faq3Answer: Yes! Tap the bookmark icon on any article to save it. Premium members get unlimited saves, while free users can save up to 10 articles.
helpSupport.faq4Question: How do I report inappropriate content?
helpSupport.faq4Answer: Tap the three-dot menu on any article or comment and select 'Report'. Our moderation team reviews all reports within 24 hours.
helpSupport.faq5Question: What payment methods do you accept?
helpSupport.faq5Answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), PayPal, and Apple Pay. All transactions are secured with 256-bit encryption.
